description_data.value: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges under certain conditions the ability to enumerate Embedded Controller (EC) commands.

description.value: CWE-200 Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor

supportingMedia.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the Product Impact section in LEN-103710.

solution.value: Update system firmware to the version (or newer) indicated for your model in the Product Impact section in LEN-103710.

description_data.value: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges under certain conditions the ability to enumerate Embedded Controller (EC) commands.
